Description:
20 waves of the endgame loop but made so that no Ghostpedes are able to spawn, all spawns occur at the same speed as normal V3.
You are given 200 homing daggers to tackle this challenge via 4 Gigapedes.
Ends after 20 waves at 718s (waves 1-20 occur over 584s; waves 10-20 span 206s, 1.844x faster than waves 1-10).
